attributes.action: Too hot working conditions for Catering staff
attributes.additional_details:
Kitchen / catering jobs are unbearable in summer with temperatures reaching to 28 and way above that.
Most places offer no air condition and workers end up with heat exhaustion.
Baring in mind catering staff often work between 10-14 hour shifts.
This is not acceptable for anyones health and should be reviewed
attributes.background: Law on too hot working conditions
